features.subtitle: Built for small businesses, freelancers, and accountants who value their time.

upload.title: Upload from Any Device
upload.description: Drag & drop receipts from your phone, email, or scanner. Supports all common image formats (JPG, PNG, WebP, TIFF, BMP, GIF) and PDFs up to 10MB per file.

aiExtraction.description: GPT-4 Vision extracts merchant, amount, date, category, tax, and payment method with 95%+ accuracy.

export.title: Export to Excel or CSV
export.description: Download organized spreadsheets ready for QuickBooks, Xero, or any accounting software.

pricing.title: Pay As You Go
pricing.description: From $0.20 per receipt with bulk packages. Buy credits when you need them, or subscribe for even better value.

security.title: Bank-Level Security
security.description: Your data is encrypted and never shared. GDPR compliant. Receipts automatically deleted after 90 days.

timeSaving.title: Save 5+ Hours Weekly
timeSaving.description: Stop manual data entry. Process 100 receipts in the time it takes to do 1 manually. Each receipt processes in under 5 seconds.

items.quote: ReceiptSort saved me hours of manual data entry. The AI accuracy is impressive, and exporting to Excel is seamless.
items.name: Sarah Chen

items.quote: As a small business owner, I don't have time for bookkeeping. This tool is a game-changer for expense tracking.
items.name: Marcus Johnson

items.quote: I was skeptical about AI accuracy, but ReceiptSort gets it right 95% of the time. The other 5% I can easily fix.

support.title: Still have questions?
support.subtitle: Our support team is here to help. Get in touch and we'll respond within 24 hours.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ReceiptSort

accuracy.question: How accurate is the AI extraction?
accuracy.answer: Our AI achieves 95%+ accuracy on clear, standard receipts. You can always manually edit any extracted data before exporting.

formats.question: What file formats do you support?
formats.answer: We support all common image formats (JPG, PNG, JPEG, WebP, TIFF, BMP, GIF) and PDF files up to 10MB per file.

cost.question: How much does it cost?
cost.answer: We use a credit system. Each receipt costs 1 credit. Credits start at $0.50 each for small packages, or as low as $0.20 each when buying in bulk (e.g., 25 for $9.99, 500 for $99.99). Subscribe monthly for even better value.

expiration.question: Do credits expire?
expiration.answer: No, credits never expire. Use them whenever you need them.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes. We use bank-level encryption (256-bit SSL), and your receipts are automatically deleted after 90 days. We never share your data.

export.question: Can I export to QuickBooks or Xero?
export.answer: We export to Excel and CSV formats, which are compatible with QuickBooks, Xero, and all major accounting software. Simply import the downloaded file into your accounting system.

customTemplates.question: How do Custom Templates work?
customTemplates.answer: Custom Templates let you create reusable export formats for VAT declarations, accounting, and more. When you export with 'Save for reuse' checked, our AI maps receipt fields to your template columns automatically. You can save up to 10 templates for FREE (no credits charged), then use them unlimited times. Each export with a template costs just 1 credit.

wrongExtraction.question: What if the extraction is wrong?
wrongExtraction.answer: You can manually edit any extracted data before exporting. If extraction completely fails, we'll refund the credit.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on credit purchases if you're not satisfied.

business.question: Can I use this for my business?
business.answer: Absolutely! Many small businesses, freelancers, and accountants use ReceiptSort for expense tracking and bookkeeping.

software.question: Do I need to install any software?
software.answer: No, ReceiptSort is 100% web-based. Access it from any device with a web browser.

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: Each receipt you upload and process costs 1 credit. Credits are deducted only when the AI successfully extracts data from your receipt. You can purchase credits in packages or subscribe for monthly credits at a discounted rate.

doCreditsExpire.question: Do credits expire?
doCreditsExpire.answer: No, credits never expire. Once you purchase credits, they remain in your account until you use them. This gives you complete flexibility to use them at your own pace.

canIGetRefund.question: Can I get a refund?
canIGetRefund.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact us within 30 days of your purchase for a full refund on unused credits.

wrongExtraction.question: What if the extraction is wrong?
wrongExtraction.answer: If the AI extraction contains errors or doesn't meet your expectations, contact our support team. We'll review the case and provide a free retry or credit refund if the extraction quality was below our standards.

needSubscription.question: Do I need a subscription?
needSubscription.answer: No, subscriptions are completely optional. You can purchase credits as needed with our pay-as-you-go packages. Subscriptions are available if you want to save money with discounted monthly credits, but you're free to use the service however works best for you.
